column5: Hope every single person that reads this catches their personal best Bass this weekend! Stay safe and bring your Team 1 signs with you!!!
Got the sign.Just have to make sure my buddie dosent knock off a nice fish with the net.  Think I,ll be craning my fish in.  Play safe all,and have FUN.
Not gonna happen. Taint no basses within 1000kms of me!!!
So sad to hear Dave. You are mising out,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
I'll be out in the morning for a father and son fish. That's always a good time...just doesn't happen often enough. I got my sign.  Here's your sign.
I would trade you any day buddy.You are living my dream.
but you get to hunt caribous, which we don't down here
Seasons been closed for 3 years because of declining numbers.
i find it surprising people actually fish for bass  but then again the people that do...probably golf as well...
I like bass fishing and golf, of course people who cruise around on lake O trolling for salmon in runabouts probably belong to polo clubs.
That is very cool Roy !!!! Hope you had a great day my friend.
